page.title: 01REVIEW OF THE BLOCK- GLASGOW
page.content: Our block includes part of Pollok which is one of the City of Glasgows 4 peripheral housing estates.{HOUSING-} Majority of housing is council house stock,2 storey high,3-4apt.{EMPLOYMENT Schools, shops, banks and building soc and l small industrial estate are the main sources of employment.Due to the lack of suitable ground there are few opportunities for developing new industry in the area.The area suffers from a high level of unemployment,with some areas as high as 40%.{RECREATION} Despite many open spaces,play areas, football pitches,etc.there is a lack of leisure and recreation facilities. {SHOPPING-}1 shopping centre and some local shops.{SOCIAL PROBLEMS} e.g. un- employment overcrowding vandalisim etc In complete contrast the rest of the block consists of farmland,golf courses and a country park.
